You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesS S] > &scy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Scy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0421/index.htm U+00421].
  * `&scy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0441/index.htm U+00441].
